about_the_game:
TIME BULLET EFFECT :

Aim, pull the trigger and follow the bullet's journey step by step. The power and impact of each shot will be tracked moment by moment with the bullet tracking effect in our game. Take your hunting experience to the next level by watching each bullet reach its target, whether in vast woodlands or open fields. This feature makes every moment more strategic and exciting. Hitting the target is now entirely up to your skills!

ANIMAL BUTCHERING - CRAFT :

Not only will you go after the animals you hunt, but you'll also get valuable resources by butchering them. You can set up camp and build a fire to cook the meat you've gathered, and test your survival skills by preparing your own food. You can use the craft system to collect not only meat from the hunt, but also leather and other materials. These materials can be used to craft new equipment, upgrade your weapons or strengthen your camp. You can also cut wood from the forest and use these resources both for trade and craft mechanics to create new items. Nature offers everything you need to survive; the important thing is to know how to use it!

EAGLE TRACKING :

Your faithful companion, a talismanic eagle that never leaves your side, will be your greatest helper during your hunting adventure. This mysterious and powerful eagle will scour the skies for other animals to track and guide you. Your eagle will always be there for you when you lose your way or sense danger. Its keen eyes will make it easier to find prey and shape your strategy. This unique bond with your eagle will unite your hunting not only with skill, but also with intuition and the power of nature.

REST :

Rest is also part of the hunting strategy. Your character can sleep at certain times, so you can recharge your energy. But you must be careful; nature becomes more dangerous when night falls. Every moment you don't sleep, more animals appear and their aggression increases. Night hunts can be riskier but also more rewarding. With the sleep mechanism, you can make strategic decisions and survive the night, or risk the dangers and go after more prey. Nature is more ruthless in the dark, so you need to time your hunts well to increase your chances of survival.

content_descriptors.notes: When an animal is killed in our game, a blood effect occurs.

name: The Lost Hunter

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2500K or AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1650 ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-7600K or AMD Ryzen™ 5 2600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® RTX 3070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 9 GB available space

short_description: The Lost Hunter is a realistic hunting and survival simulation. Hunt in dynamic weather conditions, collect resources and upgrade your equipment. Your eagle will guide you on the trail. Dangers increase at night; are you ready to survive with your strategy and skills?
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Hindi, Swedish
*languages with full audio support
